instruction: Construct a story around this piece of information.
input: The protagonist is a cat called Kit.
output: Kit was a curious little cat. Every day he would wander around his small home in the countryside, looking for new adventures to explore and new friends to make. One day, he stumbled upon a small pond and felt the urge to take a closer look. As he stepped closer, he was amazed to find that the pond was full of frogs! He'd never seen anything like it before. He was so mesmerized by the beauty of the pond and the frogs he decided to stay and watch them for a while. Little did he know that this decision would eventually change his life forever.​
